data.message: Please can you update a react button with "😒" this kind of something cause some posts irritates a lot! And i need it! 💀

replies.message: Thanks for the suggestion, Sumera! We listen to all the feedback we get from the Facebook community. If you have any more suggestions, we'd love to hear from you: http://bit.ly/2eiblrK. -Colleen
Yup ... I'm Also Waiting for That Kind Update

I really miss the option we used to have NOT to see other people's likes, comments, etc. Some of my friends are "overlikers" - they like EVERYTHING. I don't want to hide their posts, I just don't need to be notified about their "likes."
